definition: a beam laid along the edge where two sloping sides of a roof meet at the top, form into a ridge
details:
noun
- a beam laid along the edge where two sloping sides of a roof meet at the top
= synonyms: ridgepole, rooftree
- any long raised border or margin of a bone or tooth or membrane
- a long narrow natural elevation or striation
- a long narrow range of hills
= synonyms: ridgeline
- a long narrow natural elevation on the floor of the ocean
- any long raised strip
verb
- form into a ridge
- spade into alternate ridges and troughs
= example: spade into alternate ridges and troughs
- throw soil toward a crop row from both sides
= example: throw soil toward a crop row from both sides
- plough alternate strips by throwing the furrow onto an unploughed strip
- extend in ridges
= example: extend in ridges
